content.prompt: At a price of P2 in the diagram above which of the following will happen in the market?

choices.label: There will be a surplus of 30 units and 90 units will be exchanged.
There will be a surplus of 90 units and 30 units will be exchanged.
There will be a surplus of 60 units and 30 units will be exchanged.
There will be a shortage of 90 units and 30 units will be exchanged.
There will be a shortage of 30 units and 90 units will be exchanged.

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
